verses.verse: Now there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H7436>Ramathaim-zophim,<s%> of <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H453>Elihu,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8459>Tohu,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6689>Zuph,<s%> an <S%H673>Ephrathite.<s%>

And he had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives;<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H2584>Hannah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6444>Peninnah:<s%> and <S%H6444>Peninnah<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3206>children,<s%> but <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3206>children.<s%>

And <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of his <S%H4480>city<s%> <S%H5892><s%> <S%H4480>yearly<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> and to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%> And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> <S%H2652>Hophni<s%> and <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> were <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And when the <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> that <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> <S%H2076>offered,<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H6444>Peninnah<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1121>sons<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> portions: <S%H4490><s%>

But unto <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H639>worthy<s%> <S%H4490>portion;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2584>Hannah:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had shut <S%H5462>up<s%> her <S%H7358>womb.<s%>

And her <S%H6869>adversary<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3707>provoked<s%> her <S%H3708>sore,<s%> for <S%H5668>to<s%> make her <S%H7481>fret,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had shut <S%H5462>up<s%> <S%H1157><s%> her <S%H7358>womb.<s%>

And as he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year,<s%> <S%H4480>when<s%> <S%H1767><s%> she went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> she <S%H3707>provoked<s%> her; therefore she <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> to her, <S%H2584>Hannah,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H1058>weepest<s%> thou? and <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H398>eatest<s%> thou <S%H3808>not?<s%> and <S%H4100>why<s%> is thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H7489>grieved?<s%> am <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> to thee than <S%H4480>ten<s%> <S%H6235><s%> <S%H1121>sons?<s%>

So <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> they had <S%H398>eaten<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> they had <S%H8354>drunk.<s%> Now <S%H5941>Eli<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H3678>seat<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> a <S%H4201>post<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H1931>she<s%> was in <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and wept <S%H1058>sore.<s%> <S%H1058><s%>

And she <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt indeed <S%H7200>look<s%> <S%H7200><s%> on the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of thine <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> and <S%H2142>remember<s%> me, and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> but wilt <S%H5414>give<s%> unto thine <S%H519>handmaid<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2233>child,<s%> then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> him unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life,<s%> and there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4177>razor<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>as<s%> she <S%H7235>continued<s%> <S%H6419>praying<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H8104>marked<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Now <S%H2584>Hannah,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> her <S%H3820>heart;<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> her <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H5128>moved,<s%> but her <S%H6963>voice<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>heard:<s%> therefore <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H2803>thought<s%> she had been <S%H7910>drunken.<s%>

And <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H4970>long<s%> wilt thou be <S%H7937>drunken?<s%> put <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee.

And <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> I am a <S%H802>woman<s%> of a <S%H7186>sorrowful<s%> <S%H7307>spirit:<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> but have poured <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Count <S%H5414><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H519>handmaid<s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> a daughter of <S%H1323>Belial:<s%> <S%H1100><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> out of the <S%H4480>abundance<s%> <S%H7230><s%> of my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> and <S%H3708>grief<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5704>hitherto.<s%> <S%H6258><s%>

Then <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace:<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>grant<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> thy <S%H7596>petition<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> him.

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> Let thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight.<s%> So the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> her <S%H1870>way,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat,<s%> and her <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> sad.

And they rose up in the morning <S%H7925>early,<s%> <S%H1242><s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah:<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> her.

Wherefore it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H3117>time<s%> was <S%H8622>come<s%> about after <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> that she <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> saying, <S%H3588>Because<s%> I have <S%H7592>asked<s%> him of the <S%H4480>LORD.<s%> <S%H3068><s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2076>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3117>yearly<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> and his <S%H5088>vow.<s%>

But <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> went not <S%H5927>up;<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> she <S%H559>said<s%> unto her <S%H376>husband,<s%> I will not go up <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%> be <S%H1580>weaned,<s%> and then I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him, that he may <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H6213>Do<s%> what <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> thee <S%H2896>good;<s%> <S%H3427>tarry<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> thou have <S%H1580>weaned<s%> him; <S%H389>only<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1697>word.<s%> So the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3427>abode,<s%> and gave her son <S%H3243>suck<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> she <S%H1580>weaned<s%> him.

And <S%H834>when<s%> she had <S%H1580>weaned<s%> him, she took him <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her, with <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H7058>flour,<s%> and a <S%H5035>bottle<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh:<s%> and the <S%H5288>child<s%> was <S%H5288>young.<s%>
And they <S%H7819>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5941>Eli.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>Oh<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> as thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H5324>stood<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> thee <S%H2088>here,<s%> <S%H6419>praying<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H413><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5288>child<s%> I <S%H6419>prayed;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> my <S%H7596>petition<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> him:

Therefore <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> have <S%H7592>lent<s%> him to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> as <S%H3605>long<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H3117>liveth<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7592>lent<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And he <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
